thread.title: Norwegian sport wear giants The Anton Club use portrait of Ghanaian winger Ernest Asante on mammoth opening ceremony
thread.title_full: Norwegian sport wear giants The Anton Club use portrait of Ghanaian winger Ernest Asante on mammoth opening ceremony

title: Norwegian sport wear giants The Anton Club use portrait of Ghanaian winger Ernest Asante on mammoth opening ceremony
text:
FIFA 2010 Sports News | 16 October 2015 06:55 CET Norwegian sport wear giants The Anton Club use portrait of Ghanaian winger Ernest Asante on mammoth opening ceremony - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ernest Asante of Stabaek 
Ghanaian international winger Ernest Asante’s inspirational performance for Stabaek IF in Norway is earning him greatness in the Scandinavian country with sports wear shop – The Anton Club, making him their poster-boy. 
Ernest Asante in action for Stabaek 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
